Guys it works.

When Activation fails:
1.) Copy The Installation Code and paste it on the Keygen's Installation ID
2.) Click Generate
3.) Copy the Generated Serial Number
4.) Paste it on Option number 3 of the Licensce Activator
5.) Close activator and keygen then retry if it still doesn't work :D
